title: FAQ
subtitle: Things I get asked a lot

questions.title: What are your favorite TV shows ?
questions.answer: I'm a good sponge for Netflix. My all time favorites must be Stranger Things, Money Heist, Cobra Kai, Sabrina, and many more. I am still a huge fan of Stranger Things and I can't wait for the next season.

questions.title: What are your favorite hobbies ?
questions.answer: I love to listen to music, watch movies, get some knowledge from YouTube.

questions.title: What are your favorite books ?
questions.answer: I don't usually read books, but I love to read articles and watch documentaries. History and Science interest me a great deal. I am still heavily interested in the history of the world wars. The story of Chernobyl and Fukushima is something I am very interested in. I could probably explain the whole event in 2 hours.

questions.title: What are your favorite games ?
questions.answer: My absolute favorite games are Spiderman Remastered and Spiderman Miles Morales. I am a huge fan of the Spiderman series. My second favorite would be Detroit: Become Human. I also love the COD franchise.

questions.title: What are your favorite movies ?
questions.answer: Ah, tough one. It'd probably be something from Christopher Nolan. I love Inception, Interstellar, Oppenheimer and Dunkirk. I watch a great deal of movies, some of which are just random, while some are critically acclaimed. I love to watch movies that make me think about the world and the universe.

questions.title: Where can I find you ?
questions.answer: You would usually find me in Hack Club Slack, Discord, or Instagram. I am very active on these platforms.

questions.title: What's your favorite tech stack ?
questions.answer: I love to work with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I am also a huge fan of Vercel. I love to work with these technologies because they are very easy to use and they are very powerful.

questions.title: Do you freelance ?
questions.answer: Yeah, I do freelance. I have worked with clients in the past and I am always looking for new opportunities. If you have a project in mind, feel free to reach out to me.
